original_text: A sharp sword was coming out of his mouth. He will use this sword to attack the people of all the nations of the world. Then he will rule them with strong authority. He will punish them like someone who stamps on grapes in a winepress. That will show God's great anger against them. He is the Almighty God. This sharp sword shows that he speaks strong words against his enemies. See Revelation 1:16. 19: God is angry with those people who are enemies of Jesus. Jesus will punish those people like someone who stamps on grapes to make wine. See Revelation 14:19-20. 19: A sharp sword was coming out of his mouth. He will use this sword to attack the people of all the nations of the world. Then he will rule them with strong authority. He will punish them like someone who stamps on grapes in a winepress. That will show God's great anger against them. He is the Almighty God.
korean_text: 그의 입에서 예리한 검이 나오니 그것으로 만국을 치겠고 친히 그들을 철장으로 다스리며 또 친히 하나님 곧 전능하신 이의 맹렬한 진노의 포도주 틀을 밟겠고

sentences.original_text: A sharp sword was coming out of his mouth.
sentences.korean_translation: 날카로운 칼이 그의 입에서 나오고 있었다.

sentences.original_text: He will use this sword to attack the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이 칼을 사용하여 사람들을 공격할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: of all the nations of the world.
Then he will rule them with strong authority.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그는 강한 권위로 그들을 다스릴 것이다.

sentences.original_text: like someone who stamps on grapes in a winepress.
sentences.korean_translation: 포도주를 만들기 위해 포도를 밟는 사람처럼.

sentences.original_text: That will show God's great anger against them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그들에 대한 하나님의 큰 분노를 보여줄 것이다.

sentences.original_text: This sharp sword shows that he speaks strong words
sentences.korean_translation: 이 날카로운 칼은 그가 강한 말씀을 하신다는 것을 보여준다.

sentences.original_text: God is angry with those people
like someone who stamps on grapes to make wine.
sentences.korean_translation: 포도주를 만들기 위해 포도를 밟는 사람처럼.
